title: Musk Drug Use, Plagiarism Debates, & Disney's Family Feud
summary:
Kara and Scott are back with a lot to discuss! They start with the new Wall Street Journal piece on Elon Muskâ€™s drug use, and get some medical expertise and insights from Kara's brother, Dr. Jeffrey Swisher. Then, they discuss the fallout from Harvard president Claudine Gay's resignation, and Bill Ackman's wife facing plagiarism charges. Plus, Disney's family feud between ESPN and Jimmy Kimmel, a possible Warner Bros/Paramount merger on the horizon, and more.
